SummonerTeleport.name: Teleport
SummonerTeleport.sanitizedDescription: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied minion, turret, or ward.
SummonerTeleport.description: After channeling for 3.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied minion, turret, or ward.

SummonerBarrier.name: Barrier
SummonerBarrier.sanitizedDescription: Shields your champion for 115-455 (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.description: Shields your champion for 115-455 (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.

SummonerExhaust.name: Exhaust
SummonerExhaust.sanitizedDescription: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30%, their Armor and Magic Resist by 10, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
SummonerExhaust.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 30%, their Armor and Magic Resist by 10, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

SummonerMana.name: Clarity
SummonerMana.sanitizedDescription: Restores 40% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 40% of their maximum Mana
SummonerMana.description: Restores 40% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 40% of their maximum Mana

SummonerFlash.name: Flash
SummonerFlash.sanitizedDescription: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

SummonerRevive.name: Revive
SummonerRevive.sanitizedDescription: Instantly revives your champion at your team's Summoner Platform and increases their Movement Speed for a short duration.
SummonerRevive.description: Instantly revives your champion at your team's Summoner Platform and increases their Movement Speed for a short duration.

SummonerDot.name: Ignite
SummonerDot.sanitizedDescription: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
SummonerDot.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

SummonerSmite.name: Smite
SummonerSmite.sanitizedDescription: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target monster or enemy minion.
SummonerSmite.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target monster or enemy minion.

SummonerHaste.name: Ghost
SummonerHaste.sanitizedDescription: Your champion can move through units and has 27% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds
SummonerHaste.description: Your champion can move through units and has 27% increased Movement Speed for 10 seconds

SummonerClairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
SummonerClairvoyance.sanitizedDescription: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for 5 seconds.
SummonerClairvoyance.description: Reveals a small area of the map for your team for 5 seconds.

SummonerOdinGarrison.name: Garrison
SummonerOdinGarrison.sanitizedDescription: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.
SummonerOdinGarrison.description: Allied Turret: Grants massive regeneration for 8 seconds. Enemy Turret: Reduces damage dealt by 80% for 8 seconds.

SummonerHeal.name: Heal
SummonerHeal.sanitizedDescription: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
SummonerHeal.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

SummonerBoost.name: Cleanse
SummonerBoost.sanitizedDescription: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
SummonerBoost.description: Removes all disables and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
